text: Torre was a municipality of the district Blenio in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. It came together with 3 other villages to become the new municipality Blenio.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 14 January 2010 == References == ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities of Ticino Category:2006 disestablishments in Switzerland
title: Torre, Switzerland
